Comment: What he's done to our alliances will likely never recover.  What he's done to our medical research infrastructure probably won't either.  What he's done to our civil service is less likely to recover too.      He's proven no word from the US government can be trusted beyond a couple of years.  You can't trust the funding that comes out of our research institutes not to be pulled.  He's proven that every other administration can just destroy your career in government.     Even if another administration comes through and restores everything, all the people with expertise that isn't easily replaced, will be gone and often to jobs of higher pay.  They're not going to come back for lower today and a chance to be laid-off again.
